ygData.subject: Power-lvl for EQ wiz?
ygData.msgSnippet: Anyone got good lobang to PL lvl 53 wiz other than quad-kite raptors? Raptors is too siong coz my scv connection will at least LD 1-2 times per night, this
ygData.messageBody:
Anyone got good lobang to PL lvl 53 wiz other than quad-kite raptors?
Raptors is too siong coz my scv connection will at least LD 1-2 times per
night, this excludes LDing when I zone (like 1 LD per 2-3 zoning, anyone
have any advice to solve this problem?)

If LD when kiting, surely will kena killed and corpse sink into the deep
big sea. This make CR very difficult unless can get necro to summon corpse
(which can be quite jiatlat to trouble others if happens often).

Anyone can suggest what other place is fast and good xp for wiz, and when
killed at least easier to do resurrection? (best got place to do quad-kite
since it's best xp for mana). Thx.

ps: Spiroc xp very slow for my lvl liao ;(
